alert.note: Alert for Lincoln; Sublette (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued June 15 at 11:59AM MDT until June 18 at 12:00PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...The Flood Advisory is extended for the following rivers in Wyoming... Green River near La Barge affecting Lincoln and Sublette Counties. Bear River below Pixley Dam affecting Lincoln County. For the Green River Basin...including Big Piney, La Barge...elevated river levels are forecast. For the Bear River...including Pixley Dam, Cokeville...elevated river levels are forecast. ...FLOOD ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY SUNDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by rain and snowmelt continues. * WHERE...Green River near La Barge. * WHEN...Until early Sunday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 8.0 feet, Bankfull stage. Minor flooding of low lying agricultural land next to gage. At 9.0 feet, Flood stage. Nearby homes begin to see high water. Fields south of town around the gaging station have ponding water (less than 1 foot deep). * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:00 AM MDT Thursday the stage was 8.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to remain steady just above 8 feet through Friday before slowly falling to 7.5 feet early next week. - Action stage is 8.0 feet. - Flood stage is 9.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks, which may be eroded by the fast-moving water. Please report observed flooding to local law enforcement or emergency management.
